    • 方法详细资料

      • sendGetRequest

        public static <T> T sendGetRequest(AbstractClient.Path path,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> uriParams,
                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryParams,
                                   java.lang.Class<T> tClass)
                            throws ClientIOException
        Get the request
        类型参数:
        T - Type of result java object.
        参数:
        path - AbstractClient.Path
        uriParams - uri parameters
        queryParams - query string parameters
        tClass - the class of result java object.
        返回:
        response java object, could be null, mean can not find any result.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - node is not reachable or request is not valid.
        ClientIOException

      • sendPostRequest

        public static <T> T sendPostRequest(AbstractClient.Path path,
                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> uriParams,
                                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryParams,
                                    java.lang.Object postBody,
                                    java.lang.Class<T> tClass)
                             throws ClientIOException
        Post the request
        类型参数:
        T - Type of result java object.
        参数:
        path - AbstractClient.Path
        uriParams - uri parameters
        queryParams - query string parameters
        tClass - the class of result java object.
        返回:
        response java object, could be null, mean can not find any result.
        抛出:
        ClientIOException - http status 4xx means not enough energy amount.

      • callContract

        public static ContractCallResult callContract(ContractCall call,
                                              Address contractAddress,
                                              Revision revision)
                                       throws ClientIOException
        Call the contract view function.
        参数:
        call - ContractCall
        contractAddress - Address
        revision - Revision
        返回:
        ContractCallResult
        抛出:
        ClientIOException - network error
